RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added PublicationInfo. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: This data set holds 1-min resolution proton distributions (19 5-deg pitch angles vs. 24 energies) from the Proton Telescope (PROTEL) on the CRRES spacecraft. The energy range covered is 1-100 MeV. The data are in SGI(UNIX) binary format. Read software is contained within the companion documentation.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge Gary Mullen at AFRL.

InformationURL.Name: AFRL Descriptive Document
InformationURL.Description: AFRL document authored by Donald Brautigam on HEEP and PROTEL, now a readme at nssdcftp.
